alert.note: Alert for Garvin; Lincoln; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 05 at 3:19AM CST until March 05 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Critical to Extreme Fire Weather Conditions Today... .A dryline will progress across western and central Oklahoma, and western north Texas today. Behind this dryline, very warm, dry, and windy conditions are expected. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 10 AM this morning to 8 PM CST this evening. * TIMING...Today from 10 AM to 8 PM. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 10 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Upper 70s to lower 80s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that start will be difficult to contain.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior.
